name: Furnishing of free water not required
text:
Sections 201G-92 to 201G-95 shall not be construed to require the furnishing of any free water to the corporation or to the tenants or occupants of any public housing project or complex owned, operated, or administered by the corporation. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 120, §21]
   [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  Sections 201G-92 to 201G-95 shall not be construed to require the furnishing of any free water to the administration or to the tenants or occupants of any public housing project or complex owned, operated, or administered by the administration. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 120, §21 and  c 196, §26(a)]
